issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

This message was automatically generated.

Thanks [~yufeigu], 

To void invoking {{avoidExitAtTheFinish}} everywhere, how about explicitly set to allow exit_at_finish in {{SLSRunner#main}} (I assume main will be only invoked under non-junit environment).
Thanks [~wangda] for the review. Nice idea. Uploaded patch v3 for that.
